Pricing

*Contact support@performtable to get quote if you use sheets which are higher than 50000 rows

Frequently Asked Questions

What is an app?

An app is the type of visualization such as table, pie chart, card, geochart,.. that you want your data to be displayed on the website. 

Why the addon requires access to my Google Drive?

Permission to Google Drive is only necessary for the addon to perform actions related to your connected Google Form and spreadsheet on your behalf. In no circumstance, we will use those files for any other purposes or share them with third parties.

You can check out all permissions and their purposes for more details.

What data is stored in PerformTable?

No. PerformTable only stores data which is absolutely necessary for the addon to work properly. 

You can check out what data we store for more details.

How to cancel my subscription?

To cancel your subscription, please go to Pricing, and click to Unsubscribe button.  When you cancel the subscription, the current plan will be valid until the end of the subscription period.​

How to get my money back?

Within 30 days from the date of successful payment, if you send a request for the refund to our support email, you will get a 100% refund whether the cause of subscription termination comes from PerformTable or the user.

How many app does Free Plan have?

For free account, the number of available apps is 1.

Do I have to use my user account to make payment?

No. You can use a different account for payment and it does not need to be your add-on-user account.

What happen if my Free account runs out of views?

When your account runs out of views, the embed apps will be hidden and you will be notified about it. 

Views are counted each time you refresh the site.

How does PerformTable count a pageview for an app?

Each time you refresh page is counted as a pageview.

Does PerformTable autommatically renew my plan?

Yes. PerformTable automatically renews your plan every month for one-year terms. That means after one year, you must purchase the plan again to continue this auto-renewal.

What will happen if my free plan reaches pageview threshold?

A free plan is limited to 1000 pageviews while a paid plan is unlimited. Therefore, if your free plan reaches the pageview threshold, there will be a report about it.
